properties.name: spring.application.strategy.sentinel.datasource.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy sentinel datasource is enabled.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.sentinel.flow.path
properties.description: Strategy sentinel flow path, it can be classpath:xxx.json or file:xxx.json.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.sentinel.degrade.path
properties.description: Strategy sentinel degrade path, it can be classpath:xxx.json or file:xxx.json.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.sentinel.authority.path
properties.description: Strategy sentinel authority path, it can be classpath:xxx.json or file:xxx.json.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.sentinel.system.path
properties.description: Strategy sentinel system path, it can be classpath:xxx.json or file:xxx.json.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.sentinel.param.flow.path
properties.description: Strategy sentinel param flow path, it can be classpath:xxx.json or file:xxx.json.
